text: "Drivers License" (written in lowercase) is a song by American singer-actress Olivia Rodrigo. It was released on January 8, 2021, by Interscope and Geffen Records. The song has reached number one in several countries, including the US, UK, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand. The song's story is about someone earning their driver's license and visiting their love interest who has feelings for someone else. Canadian Singer Songwriter Michael Bubl√© performed it with the BBC Orchestra. == Charts == Chart (2021) Peak position == References == Category:2021 songs Category:2020s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Alternative pop songs Category:Debut singles Category:Olivia Rodrigo songs
title: Drivers License (song)
